title: A1 Bassline Discography - All Ep's + Remixes + Mixes
description:
This is my A1 Bassline Discography - it contains all original tracks, remixes and mixes available to date.

Also contains tracks given away on his blog, and myspace rip tracks.

For More info visit:    or his blog at:  a1bassline.blogspot.com

For all my other Dsicography torrents, including electro and dubstep collections, see:  thepiratebay.se/user/sjbrand99

Enjoy!
